name: .CPMZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .CPMZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created with either Miradi or ConPro, the Conservation Projects Database; designed to enable data exchanges between Miradi and ConPro; contains data used for creating and monitoring conservation plans.

content: Standard Miradi project files are saved with an .MPZ extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
